message:
Suspicious Activity Report!

Reported by Dr. Jerry on February 19, 2011 at 10:17 a.m.:

"There has been a large and unusual presence of US Customs vehicle patrolling the Avon and western Marion county Indiana areas...These are not US Border Patrol vehicles...they have a blue stripe instead of a green stripe...one vehicle has the words "US Customs Field Operations" on the rear quarter panel of the vehicle."
